interactions.Alarm:
The user, a 45-54 year old single American woman working part-time, frequently interacts with the alarm assistant to manage her weekday morning routine. She prefers to set a recurring alarm for 7:00 AM on weekdays, with a gentle nature sound to wake her up gradually.

Over time, the user has developed a habit of asking the assistant to confirm her alarm settings every Sunday evening, ensuring she starts the work week prepared. She occasionally requests temporary adjustments, such as setting the alarm 30 minutes earlier for important meetings or appointments.

The user appreciates the assistant's ability to provide reminders about upcoming alarm changes, such as for holidays or daylight saving time adjustments. She has also asked for recommendations on establishing a consistent sleep routine, leading the assistant to suggest relaxing bedtime routines and sleep tracking apps.

While the user primarily relies on the alarm for weekday mornings, she has occasionally requested one-time alarms for weekend events or travel. In these cases, she prefers more energetic tones to help her wake up fully.

The user values the assistant's understanding of her preferences and its ability to make personalized suggestions based on her routine. She has expressed satisfaction with the seamless integration of the alarm into her daily life, allowing her to start her days feeling refreshed and organized.
